attributes.action: to introduce legislation that puts a limit to the number of properties one person can own
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are far too many people entering the buy to let market with some individuals owning well over a hundred homes. They are the reason for the sharp rise in the cost of owning property. i put forward the idea that no one should own more than a few properties maybe 5 - 10 and that the tax system should be used to make it financially unviable for anyone to own more. the same policy for so called second homes which lay empty except for the odd wkend.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
